basics.name: Muralidharan Rajendran
basics.label: AI Researcher
basics.summary: Accomplished ML Engineer with nearly 4 years of AI research experience, including masters graduation. Renowned for designing and developing end-to-end ML pipelines for vision models at scale. Specialized in developing sophisticated models for object detection and segmentation tasks.

work.name: GreenBlue, Inc.
work.summary: GreenBlue is an in-house GIS software development company, specialized in marine navigation and surveying.
highlights: Working as ML Engineer centered around the captivating fields of deep learning, computer vision, and language models.
I'm actively engaged in projects involving state-of-the-art object detection and segmentation models like YOLOv8, FasterRCNN, U-Net.

work.name: CNS Company Pvt. Ltd.
work.summary: CNS is a Korean fashion retailing company that has a brand named 9oz.
highlights: Developed and implemented data management strategies using SQL procedures for efficient data handling.
Visualized patterns and trends in complex time-series data to aid in decision-making.

work.name: Adaptive Cloud Systems Pvt. Ltd.
work.summary: Adaptive Bizapp is a product-based ERP software development company, based in Singapore and India.
highlights: Contributed to both front and back-end modules, ensuring comprehensive testing with detailed test cases.
Developed C#.Net web applications for student management system, payroll managing systems.

work.name: JD Software Pvt. Ltd.
work.summary: JD Soft is a product-based company, specialized in education domain, that also has several streams like SAP, Textiles.
highlights: Participated in all stages of the software development lifecycle, from requirement gathering to deployment.
Developed EDUMAAT, an education management system, leveraging JavaEE, SpringBoot, and Hibernate.

courses: Advisor: Professor Dr. Hong Bong hee.

awards.title: Best Paper Award
awards.awarder: Korean Institute of Information Scientists and Engineers (KIISE)
awards.summary: My conference paper got accepted and won the excellet paper award to present in the conference of KSC2022 in Jeju Island, South Korea. Korea Software Congress (KSC) is a national technical conference held by KIISE which happens every year.'

certificates.name: Building Generative AI Applications with Gradio
Microsoft Learn AI Skills - Machine Learning Challenge
Spatial Data Science: The New Frontier in Analytics

volunteer.summary: Organized and coordinated multiple seminars and workshops for the student chapters of the Indian Institution of Engineers (IIE-India). These events focused on enhancing technical knowledge and professional skills among engineering students, providing them with valuable insights from industry experts and academicians.

references.name: Professor Bonghee Hong
references.reference: Professor Hong was my masters advisor at Pusan National University. He was a Computer Science professor of Database and Bigdata Laboratory, specializes in databases, big data analytics, and real-time data processing. `Email: bhhong@pusan.ac.kr`

references.name: Dr. Ahmadhon Kamolov
references.reference: Dr. Kamolov is a senior colleague at GreenBlue Inc. He is a visiting professor at Dongseo University. We have collaborated on several projects, including building footprint segmentation and climate reanalysis forecasting. `Email: kamolov@green-blue.co.kr`
